short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulates a theater mode for floatplane in desktop browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simulates a theater mode for floatplane in desktop browsers. You activate it by clicking the extension icon.

*Will only work on "www.floatplane.com/channel/[channel_name]/live" URLs
